name: Star Trek: 25th Anniversary: Enhanced CD-ROM
overview: Piloting the U.S.S. Enterprise is a thrill in itself. But now the actual voices of William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley, James Doohan, George Takei and Walter Koenig will make your adventure truly out of this world. As Captain Kirk, you'll control phasers, photon torpedoes, shields and communications. Plus, you'll test your intergalactic problem-solving savvy during eight separate space and ground missions in stunning 3-D alien worlds. This CD version features the actual voices of the cast of the original TV series.
